name: Antipasti Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'French baguette'}, {'quantity': '2 to 3', 'unit': None, 'name': 'garlic cloves, peeled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'mozzarella cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cherry tomatoes,'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(4 ounce) package', 'name': 'prosciutto'}, {'quantity': '2 to 3', 'unit': None, 'name': 'basil leaves'}
steps: Preheat the oven’s broiler to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C), and set a rack 6 inches from the heat source. Line a baking sheet with foil. Lay bread slices on the prepared sheet.. Rub peeled garlic cloves over a microplane grater to make a paste. Add garlic paste to a bowl; sprinkle with salt. Add softened butter and mix well. Spread 1 to 2 teaspoons garlic butter on each bread slice.. Broil garlic bread under the preheated broiler until golden, 1 to 3 minutes.. Remove garlic bread from oven to cool slightly on a wire rack. Place mozzarella and tomatoes in a bowl; gently toss mixture, and divide evenly between bread slices. Garnish with prosciutto and basil; serve.

name: Caprese Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) loaf', 'name': 'French bread'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'olive oil spray'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'salted butter'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'mozzarella cheese'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'tomatoes'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1/3', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh basil'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'balsamic glaze'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C), and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Cut bread in half lengthwise, lightly spray with olive oil, and place on the baking sheet, cut side up.. In a small bowl, combine butter and garlic; spread evenly on the bread halves, and top with mozzarella slices.. Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, and bread edges are starting to brown, 8 to 11 minutes.. Remove from the oven, place tomato slices on top of the cheese, season with salt and pepper, and sprinkle with basil. Drizzle with balsamic glaze, cut into slices, and serve.

name: Easy Garlic Knots
ingredients: {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'pizza dough'}, {'quantity': '1/3', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1/3', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1/3', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a large baking sheet.. Roll out dough on a lightly floured surface to a 10x16-inch rectangle. Cut dough lengthwise into 12 strips. Halve strips to make 24 (8-inch-long) strips. Tie each strip in a knot. Arrange on prepared baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes. Transfer knots to a large bowl. Drizzle with oil. Sprinkle with garlic, Parmesan, parsley, crushed red pepper, and salt. Toss gently to coat.

name: Cheesy Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) loaf', 'name': 'French bread'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan-Romano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'cup chopped', 'name': 'chopped parsley'}
steps: Preheat the oven's broiler to Low. Place bread slices face up on a baking sheet; brush melted butter over tops.. Divide garlic powder, Parmesan blend, and mozzarella evenly between slices,  in that order.. Place baking sheet on the middle rack. Broil on low until golden and bubbly, about 9 minutes. Sprinkle with chopped parsley.

name: Cheesy Stuffed Garlic Hawaiian Rolls
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 (12', 'unit': None, 'name': 'Hawaiian rolls'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': None, 'name': 'mozzarella string cheese sticks'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Separate each roll and, using a paring knife, cut a 1/2-inch slit in the side and hollow out a small hole, taking care not to cut all the way through.. Cut each string cheese in half and stick 1 piece into each prepared roll.  Place rolls in a baking dish nestled close to each other.. Place butter, garlic, parsley, salt, and pepper in a small microwave-safe bowl or measuring cup and cover loosely with a paper towel. Microwave until melted, stirring halfway through, until melted, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Brush butter mixture generously over each roll and sprinkle with grated Parmesan.. Bake in the preheated oven until rolls are golden brown and lightly toasted, 15 to 18 minutes.

name: Garlic Knots
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ¾', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'self-rising flour, plus more for kneading'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'plain whole-milk Greek-style yogurt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'unsalted butter, melted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'flaky sea salt, for garnish'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone baking mat.. Stir together flour and 1/4 teaspoon each garlic powder, salt, and Italian seasoning in a bowl. Stir in yogurt until mixture forms a shaggy dough.Transfer dough to a well-floured work surface. Knead until mostly smooth, 3 to 4 minutes. If needed, add additional flour 1 teaspoon at a time to keep dough from being too sticky.. Shape dough into a ball; press down gently to form a disk. Divide dough into 8 even wedges (a bench scraper is handy). Roll each wedge into a rope about 10 inches long. Tie into knots. Arrange knots about 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheet.. Bake until knots are lightly browned, about 15 minutes.. Meanwhile, whisk together melted butter, oil, parsley, and remaining 1/2 tsp. garlic powder and 1/4 tsp. salt in a small bowl. Brush still-warm knots with butter mixture and sprinkle with flaky salt. Cool 5 minutes before serving. Store cooled knots in an airtight container at room temperature up to 2 days.

name: Roasted Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'heads', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 pound) loaf', 'name': 'Italian bread'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley (Optional)'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Slice the tops off of garlic heads, so the tip of each clove is exposed. Place garlic heads, cut-sides up, on a baking sheet; drizzle tops with olive oil.. Bake in the preheated oven until garlic is soft, about 30 minutes.. Set the oven to broil.. Slice bread loaf in half horizontally; place cut-side up on a baking sheet.. Squeeze garlic cloves from their skins into a medium bowl. Stir in butter, Parmesan cheese, and parsley until well blended. Spread onto the cut sides of bread.. Broil bread until toasted, about 5 minutes.

name: Garlic Bread Spread
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried marjoram'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'fines herbs'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried parsley, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'loaf', 'name': 'unsliced Italian bread'}
steps: Gather ingredients and preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Mix butter, Parmesan cheese, garlic, marjoram, basil, fines herbs, oregano, parsley, and pepper together in a bowl until thoroughly combined.. Slice Italian bread loaf in half lengthwise; spread each half generously with the garlic butter mixture. Transfer onto a baking sheet.. Bake on the top rack of the preheated oven until butter mixture melts and bubbles, about 10 to 15 minutes. Turn on the oven's broiler and broil until the bread is your desired shade of golden brown, 1 to 2 more minutes.

name: Toasted Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 pound) loaf', 'name': 'Italian bread'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'extra virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler. Cut loaf into ten 1-inch slices.. Mix butter, garlic, oil, oregano, salt, and pepper together in a bowl; spread butter mixture on one side of each slice of bread; arrange bread slices, butter-side up, in a single layer on a baking sheet.. Cook under the preheated broiler until slightly brown, checking frequently so they do not burn, about 3 minutes.. Top bread slices with cheese and return to broiler until cheese is slightly brown and melted, about 2 minutes.. Serve hot.

name: Make-Ahead Garlic Toast
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '18', 'unit': 'thick slices', 'name': 'Italian bread'}
steps: Mix butter, Parmesan, parsley, and garlic powder together in a bowl until well combined.. Arrange bread slices on a large baking sheet; spread with seasoned butter. Place the baking sheet in the freezer until bread is frozen solid, about 1 hour. Transfer bread to a resealable plastic freezer bag and store in the freezer until needed.

name: Emergency Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'hot dog buns'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'butter, softened, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'garlic powder, or to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.. Separate buns and spread butter onto the cut side of each one.. Sprinkle with garlic powder. Place on a baking tray.. Toast under the preheated broiler until golden brown, about 4 minutes.

name: Homemade Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'loaf', 'name': 'French bread'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.. Mix butter, olive oil, minced garlic, garlic powder, parsley, and salt in a bowl until well combined.. Cut bread loaf into 1-inch slices and spread garlic mixture over each slice. Place each on a baking sheet. Wrap with additional aluminum foil.. Bake in the preheated oven until bread is crispy and heated through, 25 to 30 minutes.

name: Quick Garlic Breadsticks
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried basil, crushed'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'hot dog buns, split'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'margarine, softened'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.. Stir Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and basil together in a small bowl.. Place hot dog buns, cut-sides up, onto the prepared baking sheet. Spread margarine onto buns, then sprinkle Parmesan mixture over top.. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 10 minutes.

name: Parmesan Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, melted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried rosemary'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 pound) loaf', 'name': 'French bread, halved lengthwise'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).. Mix butter, Parmesan, garlic salt, rosemary, basil, thyme, and garlic powder together in a small bowl. Spread 1/2 of the mixture onto each piece of French bread. Sprinkle with additional Parmesan cheese if desired. Transfer bread, seasoned-side up, to a medium baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are very lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes.

name: Easy Cheesy Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) loaf', 'name': 'French bread'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'unsalted butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried parsley'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).. Cut bread into 1-inch thick slices, without cutting all the way through the loaf. Mix Parmesan cheese, butter, garlic powder, and parsley in a small bowl. Spread mixture between slices of bread and over top of loaf. Wrap loaf in foil, leaving top partially uncovered.. Bake in the preheated oven until butter melts and bread toasts, 15 to 20 minutes.

name: Stef's Super Cheesy Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'green onions, chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded Monterey Jack cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 pound) loaf', 'name': 'French bread, halved lengthwise'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Mix together butter, mayonnaise, green onions, garlic, Parmesan cheese, and Monterey Jack cheese in a large bowl until well combined.. Cut each French bread half into 4 pieces. Spread cheese mixture evenly over each bread piece.. Bake in the preheated oven for 8 minutes. Turn the broiler to high. Broil until hot and bubbly, about 2 more minutes.

name: Garlic Pita Bread Bites
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(10 ounce) package', 'name': 'pita bread, cut in half'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'crushed garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried Italian-style seasoning'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Open pita bread halves and roughly cut into approximately 2 inch pieces. Arrange on a medium baking sheet.. In a small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter and mix in garlic and dried Italian-style seasoning. Pour the mixture over pita bread pieces.. Sprinkle bread with Parmesan cheese, adjusting the amount as desired. Bake in the preheated oven 10 minutes, or until lightly browned.

name: Stuffed Italian Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup unsalted', 'name': 'butter, melted'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'loaf', 'name': 'Italian bread'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'shredded Italian cheese blend'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Combine butter, parsley, olive oil, and garlic in a bowl.. Slice loaf on the diagonal, about every 2 inches, starting on top of loaf to the bottom without cutting all the way through. Repeat on the opposite diagonal to create cube-shaped sections still attached to the bottom crust.. Spread butter mixture carefully between bread sections; followed by cheese. Wrap loaf in aluminum foil.. Bake in the preheated oven 15 minutes. Unwrap loaf; continue baking until cheese melted, about 10 minutes more.

name: Bread Machine Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'warm water (110 degrees F)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dry milk powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'bread flour'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'active dry yeast'}
steps: Place ingredients in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer. Select Basic Bread cycle; press Start.

name: Garlic Bread Fantastique
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'black pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sage'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'French baguette, halved lengthwise'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste'}
steps: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.. Mix butter, mayonnaise, garlic, oregano, salt, pepper, and sage in a bowl until well combined. Spread mixture evenly on baguette halves, then sprinkle Parmesan cheese over top.. Place baguette under the preheated broiler until lightly toasted, about 5 minutes.

name: Jimmbo's Garlic Knots
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(10 ounce) can', 'name': 'refrigerated pizza crust dough'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'finely chopped fresh garlic'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).. Roll out pizza dough to form a 10x16-inch sheet of dough. Cut sheet into 3/4-inch parallel strips. Then cut these strips in half, making about 24 pieces. Tie each strip into a knot and place them close together on a greased pan.. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown.. Immediately transfer hot knots to a large bowl and drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with garlic, cheese, parsley, red pepper, and salt. Toss well and serve.

name: Just Garlic Toast
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(1 pound) loaf', 'name': 'French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch slices'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, halved'}
steps: Set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler. Arrange baguette slices on a baking sheet.. Toast in the preheated oven until golden brown, 5 to 10 minutes.. Rub garlic halves on warm bread.

name: Garlic and Herb Pull Apart Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'unsalted butter, melted'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried rosemary, crushed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, crushed and chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(10 ounce) cans', 'name': 'refrigerated biscuit dough'}
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a fluted tube pan (such as a Bundt®) with cooking spray.. Mix butter, parsley, rosemary, basil, and garlic together in a bowl. Separate biscuits. Dip each biscuit into butter and herbs. Place biscuits in a random pattern into the prepared pan. Pour any remaining butter over biscuits.. Bake in the preheated oven until bread is browned and cooked through, 15 to 20 minutes. Remove from the oven, and invert the pan on a cutting board; bread will fall out of the pan in one piece. Serve by pulling bread apart into individual servings.

name: Crescent Dough Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, melted'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'refrigerated crescent roll dough (such as Pillsbury)'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper or to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.. Mix butter, Parmesan cheese, and garlic in a bowl.. Open can of biscuits but do not unroll the dough. Cut dough into 12 equal pieces using a serrated knife. Place dough slices onto the prepared baking sheet and brush with garlic butter. Sprinkle each slice with Italian seasoning, pepper, and paprika.. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 16 to 20 minutes.

name: Cheese Onion Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'French baguettes, cut into 3/4 inch diagonal slices'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'minced onion'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mayonnaise'}
steps: Preheat the broiler.. Slice the French baguettes diagonally into 3/4 inch slices.. In a medium skillet over medium heat, melt the butter. Combine the onions and garlic in the skillet. Cook and stir until tender. Set aside to cool.. In a mixing bowl, combine the mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese and mayonnaise.. On a cookie sheet, arrange the French bread slices in a single layer. Spread the onion and garlic mixture on the bread slices. Spread the cheese and mayonnaise mixture over the onion and garlic mixture on the bread slices. Broil about 5 minutes, until the cheese is bubbly and slightly browned. Serve immediately.

name: Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ⅜', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'bread flour'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh chives'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'coarsely ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'bread machine yeast'}
steps: Place ingredients in the bread machine pan in the order suggested by the manufacturer.. Select Basic or White Bread cycle, and press Start.

name: Fried Garlic Pita
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'finely chopped garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'small (4 inch)', 'name': 'pita bread rounds, cut in half'}
steps: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet over low heat. Mix in the olive oil, 1/2 the lemon juice, garlic, and garlic powder.. Place the pita bread in the skillet, and top with remaining butter and lemon juice. Cook 10 minutes, turning often, until golden brown.

name: Unbelievable Grilled Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled and minced'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded Cheddar cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'half-and-half'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 pound) loaf', 'name': 'French bread, halved lengthwise'}
steps: Preheat grill for medium heat.. In a medium bowl, mix the mayonnaise, garlic, and Parmesan cheese. In a saucepan over medium-low heat, mix the Cheddar cheese, half-and-half, and paprika. Stir constantly until melted and smooth. Pour into the bowl with mayonnaise mixture, stirring until well blended.. Place the French bread on the grill cut side down, and let it toast for a few minutes. Remove from the grill, and spread the cheese mixture on each side. Place the halves back together, and wrap the loaf in aluminum foil. Return to the grill for about 15 minutes, turning occasionally, until the loaf is heated through and the cheese mixture is hot.

name: Two-Ingredient Dough Garlic Knots
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'self-rising flour'}, {'quantity': '1.00', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'whole fat plain Greek yogurt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'granulated garlic'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'melted butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic granules'}
steps: Combine flour, yogurt, garlic granules, Italian seasoning, and salt in a bowl; mix to combine.. Dust work surface with more flour. Transfer dough to work surface. Knead dough for 8 to 10 minutes with the palm of your hand. Add more flour (1 teaspoon at a time) as needed to keep dough from being too sticky.. Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone baking mat (such as Silpat®).. Shape dough into a rounded loaf. Using a bench scraper, cut off 8 wedges of dough. Roll each wedge of dough into a rope shape and tie into knots. Place knots onto the prepared baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until knots are lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes.. Meanwhile, combine melted butter, oil, garlic granules, and parsley for topping in a small glass bowl. Brush mixture over the warm knots.

name: Lisa's Best Ever Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) loaf', 'name': 'French bread, halved lengthwise'}
steps: Melt butter in a small saucepan; simmer garlic slices in hot butter over low heat until butter turns foamy, about 5 minutes.. Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.. Place bread loaf halves under the preheated broiler to toast, 2 to 4 minutes. Watch carefully to prevent burning.. Slice toasted bread into 2-inch thick slices. Dip toasted side of each slice into garlic butter.

name: Grilled Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'baguette, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley, or to taste'}
steps: Preheat a grill to high heat.. Mix together butter, garlic, Parmesan cheese, and pepper in a bowl.. Spread the butter mixture generously on the baguette slices.. Place slices on the preheated grill and cook until butter is melted and bread is lightly brown, about 30 seconds.. Sprinkle with parsley and serve immediately.

name: 2-Ingredient Dough Garlic Knots
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'self-rising flour, plus more for kneading'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'plain Greek yogurt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, melted'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley, plus more for garnish'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Mix flour and Greek yogurt together in a medium bowl until a shaggy dough forms. Transfer to a surface dusted with more self-rising flour, and knead for 8 to 10 minutes. Continue adding flour as needed if the dough is too sticky.. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.. Combine melted butter, garlic, parsley, and salt in a small bowl.. Cut the dough into 8 pieces, roughly 2 ounces each. Roll each segment into an even 12-inch log. Shape the logs into knots by forming a cross, wrapping the top piece around the bottom piece, then connecting the two ends. Press together tightly to seal.. Move the knots to the prepared baking sheet and brush with garlic butter.. Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 15 to 20 minutes. Brush with remaining garlic butter, garnish with more parsley, and serve warm.

name: Rosemary Garlic Knots
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(10 ounce) can', 'name': 'jumbo, butter-flavored biscuits'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried rosemary, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'granulated garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chili powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Shape biscuit dough into 12 balls. Roll each ball into a 4- to 6-inch long strip.. Combine olive oil, rosemary, garlic, chili powder, salt, basil, oregano, and pepper in a bowl. Dip dough strips one-by-one into the oil mixture and roll until totally covered. Tie each strip into a knot, stretching as needed. Place knots on an ungreased baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 15 minutes.

name: Extra Garlicky Garlic Knots
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(10 ounce) packages', 'name': 'frozen pizza dough, thawed'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'flour for dusting'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Lightly oil 2 baking sheets.. Roll 1 package of pizza dough out into a 10-inch square on a lightly floured surface using a lightly floured rolling pin, using hands to pull corners. Cut square in half using a pizza wheel or sharp knife, then cut each half into 15 strips about 2/3 inch wide. Dust dough lightly with flour if necessary to prevent sticking. Gently tie each strip into a knot, pulling ends slightly to secure. Arrange knots 1 inch apart on a prepared baking sheet. Repeat with remaining dough.. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.. Meanwhile, combine oil, garlic, and salt in a large bowl.. Remove knots from the oven and brush with garlic oil. Return knots to the oven and continue baking until golden brown, 5 to 10 minutes more.. Remove knots from oven and immediately sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and parsley. Serve warm.

name: Cheesy Grilled Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'unsalted butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'pesto'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded provolone cheese, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'loaf', 'name': 'Italian bread, sliced in half lengthwise'}
steps: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.. Combine butter, tomatoes, pesto, garlic, salt, and black pepper in a food processor. Pulse until thoroughly combined and tomatoes are chopped. Scrape into a bowl and stir in 1 cup shredded provolone cheese.. Grill bread on the preheated grill until toasted, about 1 1/2 minutes. Spread butter mixture equally onto cut sides of both halves of bread and sprinkle with remaining cheese. Grill bread, cut-side up, over indirect heat with grill covered, until toping melts, 8 to 10 minutes. Let cool slightly; cut into slices using a serrated knife. Serve warm.

name: Great Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 pound) loaf', 'name': 'Italian bread, cut into 1/2 inch slices'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat; stir in garlic powder and dried parsley.. Place bread slices on a medium baking sheet. Using a basting brush, brush bread generously with melted butter mixture.. Bake in the preheated oven until lightly toasted, about 10 minutes.. Sprinkle bread with mozzarella cheese and any remaining butter mixture. Continue baking until cheese is melted and bread is lightly browned, about 5 minutes.

name: Herbed Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': '1/4 cup Country Crock® Spread'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'mixed herbs, dry'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) loaf', 'name': 'French or Italian bread'}
steps: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.. Combine all ingredients except bread in small bowl. Arrange bread on baking sheet; spread with herb mixture.. Broil until golden, about 2 minutes.

name: The Best Garlic Bread
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 pound) loaf', 'name': 'Italian bread'}
steps: Preheat the oven's broiler.. Mix together mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, and garlic powder in a medium bowl until thick and well combined.. Slice loaf in half lengthwise and spread the cut-side of each piece with mayonnaise mixture. Place halves on a medium baking sheet.. Cook under the preheated broiler until mayonnaise mixture is bubbling and golden brown, 2 to 5 minutes; check frequently to avoid burning.
